name: clear()
description: Clears the value(s) of the Element.

name: destroy()
description: Removes the Element from the DOM and destroys it. A destroyed Element can not be re-activated or re-mounted to the DOM.

name: unmount()
description: Unmounts the Element from the DOM. Call element.mount to re-attach it to the DOM.

name: update()
description: Updates the options the Element was initialized with. Updates are merged into the existing configuration.
